com.projectattitude.projectattitude.Controllers

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.projectattitude.projectattitude.Controllers.UserController

  • public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    The UserController handles which user is logged in and is able to save and load to and from the gson files.
